imdb.plot outline: Series of color features on Russian culture, history and Sport. Features premiered on Australian Television Network TEN in the lead-up to and during Sochi 2014 Winter Olympic Games Live Broadcast on channels TEN, ONE and TEN digital. Features include: Russian Cuisine, Vodka Museum, Space Museum, Ice Skating on Red Square, Kremlin, Ice Swimming, Troika - Horse sleigh rides, Russian Arts & Crafts etc.
imdb.title: Postcards from Russia
plot: Series of color features on Russian culture, history and Sport.
